item.title: Welcome
item.description:
Hello and welcome to this blog, it may not currently seem very populated, (because it isn’t) but I assure you that in the future it will be saturated with all sorts of meaningful content in which you can indulge.

Listed below are some topics that may be considered by this blog:

  • Programming of all kinds (trains, television, computer)
  • Yoyo (that thing that spins, for mastery of, see here)
  • Things about text editors (emacs, sublime, vim, … )
  • Anything else on my mind.

In any case, don’t worry if there isn’t anything here yet. The day is young.

Enjoy,
